title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Asgarnia

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 10 tasks available, there are a total of 100 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Craft an Air Rune Craft an air rune at the Air Altar. 1 Runecraft N/A
Move Your House to Taverley Move your player-owned house to Taverley. 10 Construction N/A
Receive a Slayer Task From Turael or Spria Receive a Slayer task From Turael in Burthorpe or Spria in Draynor Village. 1 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Troll in Asgarnia Defeat a Troll in Asgarnia. N/A N/A
Defeat a Blue Dragon in Asgarnia Defeat a blue dragon in Asgarnia. N/A N/A
Defeat a Black Demon in Asgarnia Defeat a black demon in Asgarnia. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Falador Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Falador Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Unlock a Gate in Taverley Dungeon Unlock a gate in Taverley Dungeon using the dusty key. N/A N/A
Enter the Taverly[sic] Dungeon Enter the Taverly[sic] Dungeon. N/A N/A
Complete a Game of Novice Pest Control Complete a game of novice Pest Control. 40 Combat level N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 16 tasks available, there are a total of 800 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete the Falador Agility Course Complete a lap of the Falador Rooftop Course. 50 Agility N/A
Obtain 20 Golden Nuggets Obtain 20 golden nuggets from the Motherlode Mine beneath Falador. 30 Mining N/A
Enter the Crafting Guild Enter the Crafting Guild. 40 Crafting N/A
Craft a Body Rune Craft a body rune at the Body Altar. 20 Runecraft N/A
Harvest Any Herb at the Troll Stronghold Harvest any herb you've grown at the Troll Stronghold. 9 Farming N/A
Defeat the Giant Mole Defeat the Giant Mole beneath Falador. N/A Bring a light source in the cave.
Defeat a Skeletal Wyvern Defeat a Skeletal Wyvern in the Asgarnian Ice Dungeon. 72 Slayer Must use an elemental shield, mind shield, dragonfire shield, dragonfire ward, ancient wyvern shield to kill.
Equip Some Granite Legs Equip some granite legs. 72 Slayer, 50 Defence, 50 Strength Must kill a Skeletal Wyvern.
Charge an Amulet of Glory in the Heroes' Guild Charge an amulet of glory at the Fountain of Heroes in the Heroes' Guild. See quest page Requires Heroes' Quest
Defeat 30 Black Dragons in Asgarnia Defeat 30 black dragons in Asgarnia. N/A N/A
Complete the Medium Falador Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Falador Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Enter the Warriors' Guild Enter the Warriors' Guild. Combination of Attack and Strength that equals 130 N/A
Complete A Porcine of Interest Complete the A Porcine of Interest quest. See quest page N/A
Defeat Some Animated Rune Armour Defeat some Animated Rune Armour in the Warriors' Guild. N/A Requires access to the Warriors' Guild.
Open the Crystal Chest Open the crystal chest in Taverley. N/A Requires a crystal key to open
Complete a Game of Intermediate Pest Control Complete a game of intermediate Pest Control. 70 Combat level N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 1,800 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip a Full Graceful Outfit Equip a full set of graceful outfit. 10 Agility N/A
Equip a Full Rogue Outfit Equip a full set of rogue gear. 50 Thieving, 50 Agility N/A
Equip a Full Prospector Outfit Equip a full set of prospector gear. 30 Mining N/A
Craft 50 Law Runes Craft 50 law runes at the Law Altar. 54 Runecraft N/A
Make 20 Ranging Potions Make 20 ranging potions. 72 Herblore N/A
Make 20 Stamina Potions Make 20 stamina potions. 77 Herblore Must be 3-dose or 4-dose potions.[1]
Steal a Diamond in Dorgesh-Kaan Steal a Diamond from a chest in Dorgesh-Kaan. 78 Thieving A lockpick
Equip a Dragon Defender Equip a dragon defender. 60 Defence Requires access to the Warriors' Guild basement.
Defeat K'ril Tsutsaroth Defeat K'ril Tsutsaroth in the God Wars Dungeon. 70 Hitpoints N/A
Defeat General Graardor Defeat General Graardor in the God Wars Dungeon. 70 Strength N/A
Defeat Kree'arra Defeat Kree'arra in the God Wars Dungeon. 70 Ranged N/A
Defeat Commander Zilyana Defeat Commander Zilyana in the God Wars Dungeon. 70 Agility N/A
Equip a Pair of Dragon Boots Equip a pair of dragon boots. 83 Slayer N/A
Complete the Hard Falador Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Falador Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Full Void Knight Set Equip a full set of Void Knight equipment. 42 , 42 , 42 , 42 , 42 , 42 , 22 N/A
Turn in 100 Mole Claws to Wyson the Gardener Turn in 100 mole claws to Wyson the Gardener in Falador. N/A N/A
Keep the Veteran Void Knight Above 150 Hitpoints Complete a game of veteran Pest Control without letting the Void Knight fall below 150 Hitpoints. 100 Combat level N/A
Complete a Game of Veteran Pest Control Complete a game of veteran Pest Control. 100 Combat level N/A
  1. ^ Jagex. JagexAsh's Twitter account. 16 December 2020. (Archived from the original on 17 December 2020.) JagexAsh: "It's checking for 4-dose or 3-dose, as you guessed."

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 4,500 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip an Infernal Tool Equip either an infernal axe, an infernal pickaxe or an infernal harpoon. 60 Attack Access to either Wilderness for Dragon pickaxe or the Fremennik Provinces for Dragon axe. Dragon Harpoon is unavailable within the league's restrictions.
Equip a Staff of the Dead Equip a staff of the dead. 75 Attack, 75 Magic N/A
Equip a Zamorakian Spear Equip a zamorakian spear. 70 Attack N/A
Equip a Piece of the Armadyl Armour Set Equip any piece of the Armadyl armour set. 70 Ranged, 70 Defence N/A
Equip a Saradomin Sword Equip a saradomin sword. 70 Attack N/A
Equip a Piece of the Bandos Armour Set Equip any piece of the Bandos armour set. 65 Defence N/A
Equip an Armadyl Crossbow Equip an armadyl crossbow. 70 Ranged N/A
Equip Some Primordial, Pegasian or Eternal Boots Equip either some primordial boots, some pegasian boots or some eternal boots. 75 Defence Requires 75 Magic, 75 Ranged, or 75 Strength depending on the boots to wear and requires 60 Runecraft and 60 Magic to create.
Equip a Godsword Equip any godsword. 75 Attack 80 Smithing to make the godsword blade
Defeat Cerberus Defeat Cerberus in the Taverley Dungeon. 91 Slayer N/A
Defeat Any God Wars Dungeon Boss 100 Times Defeat any God Wars Dungeon boss 100 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Any God Wars Dungeon Boss 250 Times Defeat any God Wars Dungeon boss 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Any God Wars Dungeon Boss 500 Times Defeat any God Wars Dungeon boss 500 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Giant Mole 250 Times Defeat the Giant Mole beneath Falador 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Giant Mole 500 Times Defeat the Giant Mole beneath Falador 500 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Giant Mole 750 Times Defeat the Giant Mole beneath Falador 750 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Elite Falador Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Falador Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Defeat Cerberus Before She Summons Souls Defeat Cerberus before she summons souls. 91 Slayer N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip Every Godsword Equip all four godswords. 75 Attack N/A
Equip a Full Armadyl Armour Set Equip a full set of Armadyl armour. 70 Ranged, 70 Defence N/A
Equip a Full Bandos Armour Set Equip a full set of Bandos armour. 65 Defence N/A
Equip Some Primordial, Pegasian and Eternal Boots Equip some primordial boots, some pegasian boots and some eternal boots. 75 Defence, 75 Strength, 75 Magic, 75 Ranged Cerberus requires 91 Slayer. Requires 60 Runecraft and 60 Magic to create.

Unlocked the Desert region to buy infinity boots to upgrade.
